fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Charismatic: Whenever you play 2 or more cards during a Day phase, gain 1 Bonus vote. [Unlocks D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Propaganda: Discard 2 cards. Gain a Negative vote. [Infinite uses, 2 CD, Unlocks D2] 
- Influence: At the end of the phase, all Chaos members draw 1 less card. (True) [1 use, Unique]
- Blackmail: Pick a player. If they do not win with you (Uncertain), the next non-self card they play will become Trapped. You will not be informed if you were successful. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [0 uses, 1 CD, Recharging]
